faq.question: Is PulseDesk suitable for small teams?
faq.answer: Yes. It is designed for freelancers and compact teams that need clarity without heavy setup.

faq.question: Can clients view progress without editing access?
faq.answer: Yes. You can share streamlined updates so clients stay aligned without changing project data.

faq.question: Do we need a long onboarding process?
faq.answer: No. Most teams can set up a workspace and start within minutes.

faq.question: Can we start before choosing a paid plan?
faq.answer: Yes. Start with a free trial, then upgrade when your workflow is ready.
